description: Patient with multiple medications - triggers medication-review skill

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Let's review your current medications today. What are you taking right now?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I take metformin for my diabetes, lisinopril for blood pressure, and aspirin.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Are you taking any over-the-counter medications or supplements?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I've been taking ibuprofen for my knee pain, and fish oil supplements.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: How often are you taking the ibuprofen?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: About two or three times a day. My knee has been really bothering me lately.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Have you had any stomach issues or changes in your blood sugar readings?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Actually, my blood sugar has been a bit higher than usual the past week.
